name: Patch It Later
description:
Use every tool at your disposal - including tiles, manipulators, and hazards - to get Patches to the key, and back again, in 16 unique levels.

It's up to you to finish what those lazy (overworked?) developers started!

Controls

AD, Space - Move Patches
Left Click - Place Objects
Scroll Wheel/Number Keys - Switch Objects
R - Restart Level
Backspace - Back to Menu

Music by Wayne Jones, YouTube Audio Library

Everything Else by Aggressive Combustion!
